cta.title: Interested
cta.prompt: Tell me about your idea and get a free consultation

questions.question: How long does it take to complete a website?
answers: This highly depends on the requirements, however I strive to finish a design within 2 weeks, and development within 3 weeks.
Aiming for a shorter timeframe will add to the total cost of the website.

questions.question: Can my website have multiple languages?
answers: Absolutely! Having multiple languages can be a powerful way to connect with users from different regions.
This feature will add to the total cost of the website.

questions.question: Do you offer website maintenance services?
answers: Yes, I can provide content changes to any static website (made with HTML, CSS, and Javascript). Depending on the technologies used, I may be able to provide further changes.
Discounted rates may be available if I developed the website.

questions.question: Can I get features not listed in the packages above?
answers: Yes, I understand that every business has unique needs and requirements. If there are specific features that you require that are not listed in the packages above, please let me know and I can create a custom package that fits your needs and budget.
My goal is to provide you with a website that meets all of your business needs, and I'm always happy to accommodate your needs whenever possible.
Just reach out to me and I'll be more than happy to discuss the details with you!

questions.question: Can you provide website analytics?
answers: Yes! I can provide access to lightweight web analytics, which is compliant with EU's data protection laws (GDPR).
